long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Enhance your experience on Perplexity.ai:
- Change your preferred AI models anywhere, even within a thread.
- Effortlessly navigate and chat with your Spaces (previously known as "Collections").
- Export or copy entire threads or individual messages as markdown (with optional citations).
- Express your unique style with customizable themes, fonts, accent colors, and CSS.
- Lots of quality-of-life and visual enhancements.
- Multilingual support.
- And many, many more...
- Open-source: https://github.com/pnd280/complexity
